techmeme.title: Sources: the US is mulling imposing the foreign direct product rule, seen as draconian by allies, on Tokyo Electron and ASML's chip equipment business in China (Bloomberg)
Sources: GitLab, which has a market cap of ~$8B, is exploring a sale after attracting interest from peers, including Datadog, which has a market cap of $44B (Reuters)
ASML reports Q2 net sales of €6.24B ($6.8B) vs. €6.03B est., net income of €1.58B vs. €1.43B est., and expects 2024 total net sales to be similar to 2023 (Arjun Kharpal/CNBC)
Source: Fei-Fei Li's World Labs, founded in April 2024 and aiming to create "spatial intelligence" in AI, raised ~$100M in its latest round at a $1B+ valuation (Financial Times)
Momentum Works: SE Asia's e-commerce GMV hit $114.6B in 2023, up 15% YoY; Shopee had a 48% share and TikTok Shop's GMV grew from $4.4B in 2022 to $16.3B in 2023 (Tsubasa Suruga/Nikkei Asia)
